entry.request: PREFIX dbpedia-owl: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> #ADD by BE4DBPedia PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> select ?label ?abstract ?thumbnail where {?resource rdfs:label ?label ; dbpedia-owl:abstract ?abstract .
